rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}

description: This unit engages students in the diverse range of methodologies and approaches that are drawn upon by researchers across the social sciences. Informed by national and international experiences, students will be exposed to theoretical, applied, qualitative and empirical research studies, skills and critiques to deepen their understanding of the research process. In addition to engaging with literature, students will develop practical skills and techniques for devising their own independent research projects. On completion of this unit, students will have conducted a thoughtful and critical review of the literature in their area of research interest, gained a deeper insight into the social science research fields and have acquired the skills and confidence to present their ideas to a professional academic audience.
